IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROGRAMS TO PERFORM WEATHERIZATION ACTIVITIES, AND SENIOR PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: PROVIDE SENIOR PROGRAM SERVICES AND WEATHERIZATION ACTIVITIES.
IRS990.Description: SENIOR PROGRAMS - 755 VOLUNTEERS (224-FGP; 81-SCP; 591-RSVP) PROVIDED HOURS OF SERVICE TO LOW INCOME SENIORS IN THEIR HOMES, AS WELL AS TO SPECIAL NEEDS CHILDREN.

Activity2.Description: COMMUNITY PROGRAMS - 428 CLIENTS FOR FORECLOSURE COUNSELING HOUSEHOLDS.

Activity3.Description: CHILD CARE RESOURCE AND REFERRAL - 7,280 REFERRALS TO PARENTS SEEKING CHILD CARE AND CHILDCARE PROFESSIONALS SEEKING TRAINING & TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE.

ActivityOther.Description: ENERGY AND HOUSING PROGRAMS - 3,411 HOMES PROVIDED WITH ENERGY RELATED SERVICES.
LEADERSHIP PROGRAM - PROVIDES HANDS ON TRAININGTO HELP PREPARE 26 MIDDLE AND UPPERMANAGEMENT EMPLOYEES FOR LEADERSHIPPOSITIONS WITH THEIR AGENCIES ANDCOMMUNITIES IN WHICH THEY LIVE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE DIRECTOR BY COMPARING THE INFORMATION REPORTED ON THE 990 TO THE INFORMATION ON THE AUDIT REPORT.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL NEW EMPLOYEES COMPLETE AND SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM. IT IS STATED ON THE FORM THAT IT IS THE EMPLOYEES' RESPONSIBILITY TO UPDATE THE FORM WHEN NECESSARY. DURING THE EMPLOYEE EVALUATION THEY ARE ASKED IF IT NEEDS TO BE UPDATED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. ANY INCREASES AFTER BEING HIRED IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AFTER THEY HAVE COMPLETED THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS EVALUATION. THE COMPENSATION FOR OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES IS DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PRESENTING A RECOMMENDATION TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR APPROVAL.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON RECEIVING A WRITTEN REQUEST.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN AUDIT COMMITTEE THAT HAS THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE OVERSIGHT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND AUDIT. THEY REPORT TO THE FULL BOARD.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF LIFE OF APPALACHIAN OHIO RESIDENTS
